resources.string: World College of Technology and Management (WCTM) over the years has emerged one of the best engineering college in Gurgaon (Gurugram) and is proud to be a learning centre for research, training, development, science, engineering and technology. Established in the year 2007, WCTM is located in the cyber city of India, Gurgaon. The college is approved by All India Council for Technical Education (AICTE), Ministry of Human Resource Development, Government of India. WCTM is spread across 18 acres surrounded by the lush green campus.

OUR ADDRESS
